channel.title: Adding titles
channel.description:
Okay my game is 659 and i was wondering how to add a title such as if your a donator when you talked it would say [Donator]John:...............
Please help i need it so bad and how could i add a changetitle command?

item.title: Adding titles
item.dc:creator: @Alecrespawn Alecrespawn
item.description:
@Alecrespawn wrote:

idk much about a 659 but in a 317 its in client.java and just ctrl+f and search up Donator until you get rights for it.

Read full topic
